Posts.Content: please dont have hair extension im a hairdresser and just been diagnosed with ovarian cancer ... extension are bad your ur hair .. it does not let your hair grown strong it makes it worse and pulls more of your hair out .... im dreading losing my hair when i start chemo cause its me my hair and its my job people look at my hair cause im a hairdresser but nowt i can do .. just try and think i rather lose have and not have cancer :) good luck to u and to everyone reading this xxx
Posts.Title: CMF OR FEC WITH A COLD CAP?
